title.rendered: Top 100 Companies Hiring Students on Handshake Right Now

content.rendered:
Looking for your next internship or job? Wondering which companies are hiring? Look no further than the list below. Handshake is the #1 place employers recruit college students and new grads, and these are the top 100 companies looking to hire students like you.

The 100 companies below—many from the Fortune 500!—are hiring across all 50 states, and across all industries and roles. 

Tips:

  • We update this list often to ensure maximum freshness, so many of the companies below are new as of October 2021. Type “newly added” to the search field to see the most recent additions.
  • Use the search bar to explore the list of companies hiring now based on name, industry, and location.
  • See if the company is hiring for jobs, internships, or both.
  • Remember that each industry hires for multiple job roles.

To find even more open roles, log into Handshake today to see personalized job recommendations. Over 500,000 employers recruit on Handshake!

Until the next update to this list, follow us on Instagram and Twitter for weekly employer updates, job search tips, and more.
